page.title: 04FARMING KILN MIRE MACHINERY
page.content: WE HAYTIME ON MY FARM. WHEN THE GRASS IS BETWEEN 60_70 CMS LONG IT IS READY. FIRST WE MOWIT THEN WE STROW IT OUT TO DRY WITH THE HAY BOB,AND THEN ROW IT UP WHEN IT IS DRY AND LIGHT.THEN WE BAIL WITH THE BAILER.THE BAILS COME ON TO THE SLEDGE AND THEN GO OUT ON TO THE CUT FIELD.WE COLLECT THEM IN AN EMPTY TRAILER,AND TAKE TO THE BARNS. THE ELEVATOR GOES FROM THE TRAILER TO THE BARN_WINDOW AND IT TAKES THE BAILS TO THE LOFT WHERE SOMEONE TIDIES THEM. WHEN IT IS WINTER THEY ARE GIVEN TO THE COWS
